description.p: Hello World demonstrates all the major features of building deployable packages with PupNet. It can be built for all deployment package kinds, including AppImage, Flatpak, DEB and RPM for Linux, and as a Setup file for Windows. It provides an example of using desktop and metainfo files, as well as icons and a post-publish script.
For example, you will also notice that this AppStream metadata file, and the desktop file, make use of
macro variables for a high degree of automation on content, so that information need only be specified once in the primary configuration.

On execution, the Hello World program dispays assembly information, including version. This confirms that version information was supplied from the deployment configuration, via the build system, to the application.
